thread.title: BRIEF-Mednax Announces Acquisition Of Pediatric Ophthalmology Practice In Washington

title: BRIEF-Mednax Announces Acquisition Of Pediatric Ophthalmology Practice In Washington
text: March 21, 2018 / 11:06 AM / in 16 minutes BRIEF-Mednax Announces Acquisition Of Pediatric Ophthalmology Practice In Washington Reuters Staff March 21 (Reuters) - Mednax Inc: * MEDNAX ANNOUNCES ACQUISITION OF PEDIATRIC OPHTHALMOLOGY PRACTICE IN WASHINGTON * MEDNAX INC - ‍NO ADDITIONAL TERMS OF TRANSACTION WERE DISCLOSED.​ * MEDNAX INC - ‍NO ADDITIONAL TERMS OF TRANSACTION WERE DISCLOSED.​ * MEDNAX INC - DEAL WAS A CASH TRANSACTION AND IT IS EXPECTED TO BE IMMEDIATELY ACCRETIVE TO EARNINGS​ * MEDNAX INC - ‍ANNOUNCED ACQUISITION OF CHILDREN’S EYE CARE, LLC, A PRIVATE PEDIATRIC OPHTHALMOLOGY PRACTICE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
